ValidationRule.label: Captcha

StringProperty.label: Characters
StringProperty.Description: The characters list to be used by the captcha code (default is ABCDEFGHIJKLMNPQRSTUVWXYZ123456789).

BooleanProperty.label: Ignore Case
BooleanProperty.Description: If checked, the comparison is performed ignoring case sensitivity.

IntegerProperty.label: Min Length
IntegerProperty.Description: The minimum number of characters to be used to create the control code (default is 6). This value is ignored if greater than the Max Length property.

IntegerProperty.label: Max Length
IntegerProperty.Description: The maximum number of characters to be used to create the control code (default is 6). This value is ignored if lower than the Min Length property.

IntegerProperty.label: Min Font Size
IntegerProperty.Description: The minimum font size to be used in the control code (default is 20).

IntegerProperty.label: Max Font Size
IntegerProperty.Description: The maximum font size to be used in the control code (default is 35).

StringProperty.label: Font Names
StringProperty.Description: The pipe-separated list of the available font families (default is Arial|Tahoma|Verdana).

IntegerProperty.label: Width
IntegerProperty.Description: The width of the control code container (default is 200).

IntegerProperty.label: Height
IntegerProperty.Description: The height of the control code container (default is 50).

StringProperty.label: Color Ranges
StringProperty.Description: The range of colors to be used to render the characters. It's expressed in RGB. It's composed by three couple of values (default is 0,100,0,100,0,100).

StringProperty.label: Background
StringProperty.Description: The color of the control code background. It's expressed in RGB (default value is 255,255,255).

ValidationRule.Description:
A Captcha validation rule decorates a field of type String with a Captcha challenge-response test.
The validation error message can be composed using the following placeholders:
  • ${propertyValue}: the field value
  • ${propertyName}: the field name
  • ${objectName}: the parent component name
